*Not a sound was heard, not a leaf fluttered as a carnivor moved silently 
among the trees. The shadows of the forest hid the passing of the predator 
as it's black hide blended into them, the soft caress of the shadows giving 
the beast confidence as it moved on towards it's prey!
It moved with stealth and cunning as it placed every footfall carefully and 
with precision, it crept low in order to escape detection by it's quarry.
Every sense alert and alive with the environment around, the predator moved 
closer to it's target and locked it's sight on the movement that had 
attracted it's attention in the first place.
It had been stalking a particularly cunning doe before a sudden flash of 
movement and snarls of rage had caused it's attention to be diverted.
To give this carnivor even more of an advantage as it stalked it kept on all 
four of it's limbs, each with the power to crush the skull of and elephant.
Every muscle twitched with eagerness to strike now but the carnivor hadn't 
lasted this long by springing attacks early.
It could now see the source of the sudden noises and stopped, breathing 
softly and with calm as it observed it's new prey.
It bared it's teeth and thought...*

< Raptors!>
